00034 class Izindo : public PairCalculator
00035 {
00036 public:
00037     Izindo() {};
00038     ~Izindo() {};
00039 
00040     //const char *Description() { return "Semi-empirical electronic coupling elements for all neighbor list pairs"; }
00041 
00042     void EvaluatePair(QMTopology *top, QMPair *pair);
00043 };
00044 
00045 inline void Izindo::EvaluatePair(QMTopology *top, QMPair *pair){
00046     CrgUnit *crg1 = pair->Crg1PBCCopy();
00047     CrgUnit *crg2 = pair->Crg2PBCCopy();
00048     vector <double> Js = top->GetJCalc().CalcJ(*crg1, *crg2);
00049     pair->setJs(Js);
00050 }
00051 
00052 }}
